articles.author: J Brooks Spector
articles.title: The Jewish lawyer-turned-comic-turned-president behind... - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Extraordinary times in Eastern Europe deliver both the good guy and the villain of a dramatic year. Volodymyr Zelensky emerged clearly as the claimant of international hero status.
articles.content: Not so long ago, Volodymyr Zelensky was just one more leader of a struggling, often chaotic, squabbling, former Soviet republic. True, his nation was trying hard to shuck off any remnants of old-styl… [+6737 chars]
